user.title: Account
user.description: This integartion will disguise itself as the TCL-Home Android application. Use the same credentials as you use in the app. (It's recommended to use a separate account for this integration and share the devices for the new account in case TCL would ban the acount.)

settings_of_app.title: Android app settings
settings_of_app.description: Ususally you should leave this values as they are. They are here in case TCL changes this values in the future. In that case you could correct theme here without need to update the integration.

settings_of_logs.title: Log settings
settings_of_logs.description: You can turn on logging later in the options of the integration. Logs will be in the Settings -> System -> Logs -> ([...] menu) -> Show raw logs

data.verbose_device_logging: Device related logs, raw jsons of device states changes, ect.
data.verbose_session_logging: Session management logs, access tokens, etc.
data.verbose_setup_logging: Setup related logs, configuration flow inital found devices, etc.

settings_of_behavior.title: Behavior settings
settings_of_behavior.description: Change default TCL Home app behaviors.

data.behavior_keep_target_temperature_at_clie: Keep the current target temperature when change the mode from the Climate controll
data.behavior_mute_beep_on_power_on: Auto turn off the beep mode when the device is powered on so it's always silent

init.title: Options
init.description: Any configuration change will do a re-login to the TCL Home app.
